name: space walk (1111Zelda)
description:
The idea is that the world fell apart and you, the viewer are the only one on a piece of floating rock; nothing makes sense. 

Some things look familiar but some things are Large, some are floating, some are falling apart. 

Its surreal and makes you question whether you actually made it out alive what brings you comfort are the icons you saw in the world you knew; you have this little piece of rock that you can wander around on. 

This space is open for interpretation, but the idea is that you wander and wonder about the meaning of it all, why did this happen? Why are you still here? Are there others? and at the center of it all you find a music box with the planets going around like they have for as long as you can even understand and off the bridge you see a dark figure staring off into space. This is open to interpretation.

But is intended to represent you, the viewer.
